name: Nicto
description:
Deliver lines of your speech by pressing the prompted key.

Blink at the appropriate time.

Failing at either of these will raise suspicion.

If suspicion gets too high, they see through your ruse.

They stare at you in shock....

What are you?

Space/Shift/Ctrl/Alt: blink

Letter keys: speak

Hold Esc: quit

Made for #gameideajam. Based on this tweet.

Windows-only.
